title: Dispute & Chargeback Specialist (PayPal & Shopify) – Easy Weekly Pay + Long-Term Work
job_overview:
Dispute & Chargeback Specialist (PayPal & Shopify) – Easy Weekly Pay + Long-Term Work
Location: Remote | Type: Part-Time / On-Call | Rate: $50/week (paid every Sunday)

We are looking for a skilled and reliable Dispute & Chargeback Specialist to manage PayPal disputes and Shopify chargebacks on a flexible, on-call basis. If you're experienced in winning disputes and enjoy independent work, this is the perfect role for you.

???? Responsibilities:
Respond quickly to new PayPal and Shopify disputes.

Collect and organize compelling evidence to support our cases.

Write and submit professional responses to disputes and chargebacks.

Track and follow up on dispute outcomes.

Work a few times per day only when disputes or chargebacks are present.

? Requirements:
Proven experience in handling and winning PayPal and Shopify disputes.

Excellent written English and communication skills.

Strong attention to detail and critical thinking.

Experience with Re:amaze is a strong plus.

Fast, reliable internet and ability to respond in a timely manner.

???? Compensation:
$50 USD per week (flat rate)

Paid automatically every Sunday

Long-term, stable opportunity for the right person
